definition: He Yingqin (1890-1987), senior Guomindang general
surname He
what/how/why/which/carry
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
surname Ying
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
surname Qin
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself

sentences.english: Ho Ying-chin had been the Kuomintang's chief of the general staff and minister of national defence.
sentences.chinese: 何应钦，曾任国民党军参谋总长和国防部长。

sentences.english: Ho Ying-chin, a Kuomintang warlord, was another leader of the pro-Japane se group.
sentences.chinese: 何应钦当时是国民党中亲日派的另一首领。

sentences.english: General Ho went to the United States.

definition: Chiang Kai-shek (1887-1975), military leader, head of the Nationalist government in China 1928-1949 and the government in exile on Taiwan 1950-1975
Li Zongren (1891-1969), a leader of Guangxi warlord faction
Zhang Zhizhong (1890-1969), National Revolutionary Army general
Bai Chongxi (1893-1966), a leader of Guangxi warlord faction, top Nationalist general, played important role in Chiang Kaishek's campaigns 1926-1949
Yan Xishan (1883-1960), warlord in Shanxi
Feng Yuxiang (1882-1948), warlord during Republic of China, strongly critical of Chiang Kai-shek
Nationalist government 1920s-1949 under Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
Zhang Xueliang (1901-2001) son of Fengtian clique warlord, then senior general for the Nationalists and subsequently for the People's Liberation Army
Wang Ching-wei (1883-1944), left-wing Guomingdang politician, subsequently Japanese collaborator
Yang Hucheng (1893-1949), Chinese warlord and Nationalist general
Military Commission of the Communist Party Central Committee/same as 軍委|军委
Guomindang or Kuomintang (KMT)/Nationalist Party
Fu Zuoyi (1895-1974), Guomindang general, subsequently PRC top general and politician
Duan Qirui (1864-1936), commander of Beiyang Army under Yuan Shikai, then politician and powerful warlord
Sun Chuanfang (1885-1935) one of the northern warlord, murdered in Tianjin in 1935
Tang Shaoyi (1862-1939), politician and diplomat
